channel.title: Admins death
channel.description:
Hi,
I have been running a server for about 7 months now and recently upgraded the source, i am a bit stuck however,
In the new source, if PlayerRights > 2 then you don't lose your stuff when you die, seeing as i am owner, and i like pking, this kinda sucks,
Can anybody help me?

item.title: Admins death
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

[quote=“p0sesed s0ul, post:49, topic:244638”]woopsy

ok open up client.java and press CTRL+F and find

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

now replace that with this 1

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

and admins and owners now drop items

sorry for the 1 b4

im tired ok[/quote]
I said that on the 1st/2nd page…

Read full topic

ok open up client.java and press CTRL+F and find

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

now replace that with this 1

if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 &&  System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {

and admins and owners now drop items

sorry for the 1 b4

im tired ok[/quote]

item.title: Admins death
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

ok first open up client.java then search for

public void dropItem(int droppedItem, int slot) {

now underneath that you will see

if (playerRights == 2) { sM("Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventoy instead."); return ; }
remove that therefore making it so you can drop

hope this helped need anymore help just ask?

Read full topic

item.title: Admins death
item.dc:creator: @adamp40 adamp40
item.description:
@adamp40 wrote:

SEARCH FOR

removeAllItems();

and if you ever notice the playerRights > 2 then change it to playerRights < -1

which means only players with less than -1 rights (which is nobody) not loose items

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:6, topic:244638”]Yes , heres my ApplyDead code:

[code]

}
} catch (Exception e) {}
deleteItem(6570, getItemSlot(6570), 1);
sendMessage(“Your Fire Cape vanishes as it hits the floor”);
}

stillgfx(432, absY, absX);
[/code]
    removeAllItems(); //here it is ;)
[code]

	pEmote = 2304;
        actionTimer = 3;
	
        teleportToX = 2512;
        teleportToY = 3863;
        
        // pWalk = 13;
        sendMessage("OH EM GEE YOU DIED!");
        hitDiff = 0;	
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
    }

It’s made by me and has a death emote so don’t leech it , please.

                PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(

                PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
                PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
